channel.title: [562] compiler help [562]
channel.description:
Atm i get the error
Compiling model 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
and my colpiler file is:
@echo off title Model Compiler echo Compiling model javac -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/model/*.java pause
HELP! Thanks

item.title: [562] compiler help [562]

item.description:
